level.heading: Certification audits.
level.text: The District of Columbia Auditor may conduct random audits of certification files to determine whether the Department followed the requirements set forth in ยง 2-218.61. The District of Columbia Auditor shall submit findings and recommendations to the Department and the Council.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-141, see notes following ยง 2-218.02.
